name: Easy Beer and Ketchup Meatballs
author: KIMMYPOO
summary: This is an easy and delicious appetizer. I have made these for potlucks, baby showers, and super bowl parties. They go fast!
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place the beer and ketchup in a slow cooker on high setting and allow to simmer
Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine the ground beef, garlic powder and onion, mixing well
Form mixture into meatballs about 3/4 inch in diameter
Place meatballs in a 9x13 inch baking dish
Bake at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 20 minutes
Transfer meatballs to the slow cooker with the beer and ketchup and simmer for 3 hours; sauce will thicken
